page.title: 16ENERGY
page.content: We had a survey in our class to find what types of {energy}we used in our homes.For cooking {68%}used{gas}and { {32%}used{electricity}.{68%}had{central {heating}({36% gas,22% electric,5% oil, &{5% coal}).Well over half the class,including many with central heating,still had a conventional fire place burning gas,coal or electricity. Everybody had a{fridge,freezer}&{ {washing machine}while {55%}also had a {tumble dryer}.Everybody had at least one {power tool}in their house with{ {73%}having in excess of two.{36%}of the families in our class did not own cars,{32%}had {one car},{23%}had{two {cars}and {9% }owned {more than two {cars}.{86%}of the class said that their parents owned lawn mowers.{64% of these were{electric,14% petrol}and{ {8% human}(push)powered.
